mapper.select: SELECT group_invite_no as groupInviteNo, group_name as groupName, group_no as groupNo, group_invite_no as groupInviteNo, group_invite_approval as groupInviteApproval, personal_information_approval as prsonalInformationApproval, group_invite_date as groupInviteDate, group_kind_Name as groupKindName FROM group_invite a INNER JOIN group_kind b INNER JOIN group_invite_approval c ON a.group_kind_no = b.group_kind_no ON a.group_invite_no = c.group_invite_no ORDER BY group_invite_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow},#{pagePerRow}
